meanings.definition: A person who thinks deeply or carefully.
meanings.sent1: Young thinkers enjoy pondering questions about the world.
meanings.sent2: Teachers often encourage students to be critical thinkers.
meanings.sent3: The thinkers in the library were lost in thought about their favorite books.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a playground where imaginative thinkers roamed freely.
meanings.sent5: The group of thinkers gathered to discuss philosophy under the old oak tree.

meanings.definition: A group of people who engage in thinking or intellectual pursuits.
meanings.sent1: The thinkers in the research team collaborated on solving complex problems.
meanings.sent2: Innovative thinkers often come up with creative solutions to challenges.
meanings.sent3: The thinkers at the conference shared their ideas over cups of coffee.
meanings.sent4: The room buzzed with energy as the thinkers debated different viewpoints.
meanings.sent5: The thinkers in the think tank brainstormed new inventions for the future.
